page.title: 15FARMING (cont)
page.content: { FARMS IN AND AROUND BALCOMBE {(MACHINERY 2) {Tractors}are the vehicles that do the main work on the farm apart from the people.It can carry loads of different kinds of ploughs for ploughing and furrowing.There are two kinds of hay bales:round and square.THe tractor goes round the field with either a round or square baler and the baler lays the bales out on the field.There is rivalry between the different farms with different makes of tractor. {Combine harvesters }are things that separate the corn heads from the stalks.They have blades at the front of them and are very big.They are dangerous and can chop rabbits into pieces so you must keep out of the way while they are at work.
